page.title: 11SENIOR CITIZEN OF BARCOMBE.
page.content: {A report by Zoe Stenning. The following are comments about living in Barcombe today, by Mrs. Pratt a senior citizen of the village: Things have changed a great deal since I was at school.However some things are the same like stoolball, netball and tennis, which we used to play. The price and value of money has changed a lot. The price of food is much higher and I remember when I worked for ten shillings a day.Food itself has changed because most of it is frozen now. Houses have changed and are now modernized. For example we have a bathroom and toilet upstairs.I like living in Barcombe very much because it is nice and peaceful with not much traffic.I much prefer the countryside and would never move away.
